sense.name: leave or give up a job, post, or tenancy
sense.examples: Algerian gunmen vacated the flow station yesterday morning, releasing close to 40 Agip staff, soldiers and naval personnel. He vacated the office of sheriff in 1999. In 2003 he vacated the British Super Middlweight title.

sense.name: annul, make legally void
sense.examples: SciMed Life Systems Inc. said a federal appeals court vacated an earlier summary judgment in its favor. The judge vacated the sentence.
